inputs.text: A donkey gracefully rides a surfboard, going from a fiery volcanic wave to a frozen, icy landscape. Initially, the dark brown donkey stands on a surfboard amidst a wave of lava, the intense orange flames illuminating its silhouette. The camera maintains a medium shot, slightly angled, capturing the donkey's determined expression. The scene shifts smoothly to a wide shot of the donkey on the same surfboard, now gliding across a frozen lake with scattered ice floes and snow-covered rocks. The lighting changes to a bright, clear winter day. The donkey's expression remains calm; its movement is smooth and controlled. The video is computer-generated imagery.
